title: (x) Kings of Leon - Day old Belgian Blues, font? - Coventry Garden {Mike Y, Rainer}
content:
I've seen it somwhere,...  
But the name?

Thanks! A+

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202115711im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dayoldbelgianblues_5871.jpg)
author: Allison Dh

comments.content:
It's one of Nick Curtis's freebies called Coventry Garden, I think.

- Mike Yanega

[Coventry Garden](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202115711/http:/www.cheapprofonts.com/Coventry_Garden_NF_Pro.php) by Nick Curtis.

EDIT: Late, but at least I linked to the PRO-version …

Here's the [Coventry Garden Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202115711/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/coventry-garden-nf-pro/) version for $10.

- Mike Yanega

Let's call it a tie Renko.

- Mike Yanega
Cheers Mike … but it's your ID!
